type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Demigod Lord
rules_text:
Trample
[i]Radiant[/i] [i]Strategist[/i] – Noncreature spells you cast can't be countered. The first noncreature spell you cast each turn costs {3} less to cast.
[i]Dawn's Hero[/i] – Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter Ike & Soren. Creature spells you casts cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Ike & Soren.
